channel.title: CVE Feed for Schneider Electric SE -- Modicon M340, Modicon Premium, Modicon Quantum, BMXNOR0201
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Schneider Electric SE -- Modicon M340, Modicon Premium, Modicon Quantum, BMXNOR0201

item.title: CVE-2018-7760|2024-08-05T06:37:59.111Z -- schneider%20electric%20se -- modicon%20m340%2C%20modicon%20premium%2C%20modicon%20quantum%2C%20bmxnor0201
item.description: An authorization bypass vulnerability exists in Schneider Electric's Modicon M340, Modicon Premium, Modicon Quantum PLC, BMXNOR0200. Requests to CGI functions allow malicious users to bypass authorization.
